title: Patton Oswalt
description: Samantha Bee talks to comedian Patton Oswalt about engaging with Trump supporters on Twitter, making breakfast, and his forever-career as a DJ. They agree that you should always listen to Dolly Parton.
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee)
content:encoded: Samantha Bee talks to comedian Patton Oswalt about engaging with Trump supporters on Twitter, making breakfast, and his forever-career as a DJ. They agree that you should always listen to Dolly Parton.
